editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven
editedFacts.rooms: Breakfast nook, Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Office, Pantry, Sun room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: Old Fig Charm at its finest! Remodeled Custom 4400 Sq Ft, 5bd/4ba home on an expansive near-acre estate lot. Beautiful pool with decorative fencing and brick accent wall. Poolside building with changing rooms, shower, bathroom and built-in BBQ area. 3 Expansive lawn areas and multiple gardens. Home features open living area, family/media room, wet bar, laundry-mud room with bathroom and walk-in pantry, separate craft area, breakfast nook off kitchen. Tons of storage and custom built-ins throughout. Downstairs master suite with fireplace and completely remodeled bathroom with custom Marble vanity, jetted tub and dual walk in closets. There is a 2nd downstairs bedroom also usable for a den/office. Upstairs are 3 bedrooms with landing/sitting area and remodeled bath. Completely new kitchen with new cabinets, countertops and backsplash. Wolf double oven and cooktop. Corner lot with ample parking. Attached 2 car Garage plus detached 2 car with separate entry gate.Traditional Sale.
response.whatOwnerLoves: This home is located in the much desired Old Fig area in Fresno. Situated on a one acre lot with mature landscaping and lush grounds, this home provides an oasis from it all while also great for entertaining.
